channel.title: Constant Crash early game
channel.description: Shortly after I get the crowbar and see the zombie transformation scene, I head through the door and get the loading screen as expected. Then the game crashes. Attached are two separate crash reports.hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T17_47_9C0.mdmp (74.9 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T17_28_54C0.mdmp (74.9 KB) Please help. Have enjoyed the game so far. Also, unrelated, I am having some texture difficulties, probably related to having to run DirectX 8.1 on my hardware... Basically, almost everyone's eyes are checkered purple and black and the radioactive waste is too. Any advice would be helpful.

item.title: Constant Crash early game
item.dc:creator: AlGae117
item.description:
Still experiencing this issue, shortly after getting the crowbar in Unforeseen Consequences is a loading screen where my game crashes. Please help.

Shortly after I get the crowbar and see the zombie transformation scene, I head through the door and get the loading screen as expected. Then the game crashes. Attached are two separate crash reports.hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T17_47_9C0.mdmp (74.9 KB)
